name: Datadog RUM
headline: Integrate your store with Datadog Real User Monitor
overview: Datadog Real User Monitoring (RUM) provides deep insight into your application's frontend performance. Monitor real user data in order to optimize your web performance and provide exceptional user experiences.
features: Configure Datadog Real User Monitor using the VTEX admin panel
Track user interactions and performance metrics
Monitor real user data to optimize web performance
additionalInformation: For more information about configuring your Datadog RUM Pixel, see the [Datadog documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/browser/setup/)
